short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows additional property info on Zoopla

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows additional information on Zoopla property pages likes crime statistics for the area, school ratings based on latest GSCE results, the local government and a link to the nearest Nandos.
